Felizmente tudo acabou bem e o resgate foi efetuado rapidamente. A seguir, reproduzo... [Read More]

resample and derive or derive and resample? [paper review]

Posted on December 15, 2015

Working with Digital Elevation Models (DEMs) have became a standard practice in scientific disciplines related to the physical environment, from geomorphology, geology, to biogeography and climate modeling. The Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM - Farr et al., 2007) and ASTER GDEM (Tachikawa et al., 2011) provide a near-global to global... [Read More]
